description: The Patriot Xporter Axle USB drive is the ideal solution to transport important data wherever you go. At just under 1 inch in length when closed, the Axle is unbelievably small and lightweight, yet offers fast transfer speeds to move images, movies and other documents. Utilizing a swivel capless design to protect the USB connector, the Axle is available in 4GB and 8GB capacities and comes with a 1-year warranty. Whether moving or saving your valuable data; Xporter Axle is the perfect choice. The Xporter Axle is compatible with Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows ME, Linux 2.4 and later, Mac OS9, X and later.
title: Patriot 32GB Axle Series Cap-less USB 2.0 Flash Drive - PSF32GAUSB
